name: Snowboarding+
description:
Snowboarding+ is your ultimate 3D snowboarding simulation game. You customize your snowboarder, and board, then snowboard down multiple terrains of varying difficulty trying to achieve the fastest time possible! These breathtaking graphics, and exciting gameplay will leave you totally stoked, dude.

This game is optimized for your latest device with native graphics and accelerated performance!

Features Include:
-Breathtaking Graphics
-Exciting Gameplay with keyboard/mouse
-Punk Rock Soundtrack
-Customize Snowboarder Appearance and Boards
-Many different trails/terrains to choose from
-Simple interface and controls
-Latest Physics and 3D graphics rendering technology

This realistic world is so immersive, you'll feel you're on the course for real. Totally dude!
